title: Retrieve information from scopus.com and scholar.google.com
Retrieve information from scopus.com and scholar.google.com
text: Tiddlers tag bibtex-entry added following fields scopus-eid unique id Scopus. scholar-cid unique id search list Scholar. scholar-cites unique id author profile Scholar depends whether citation.

title: Retrieve information from scopus.com and scholar.google.com
code: scopus_eid() # obtain eid from scopus.com scholar_ids() # obtain cid and cits from scholar.google.com
